item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to CIS 188! About Us TODO: add pictures, fun facts Peyton Junior in CIS peyton is so bad at math he had to drop out of nets Armaan Junior in CIS and (wait for it) Finance armaan’s fun fact is that he has no free time ever Davis Senior in CIS resident cranky old man fun fact: davis was right about covid Campbell Sophomore in NETS resident baby fun fact: campbell refuses to sleep … ever Housekeeping Grade breakdown 60% homework (6 homeworks) 40% final project Gradescope for submission Piazza for class questions Two 2-hour office hour sessions per-week What is DevOps?
